citations.bibl: D.B.: HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE ARUP KUMAR GOSWAMI, CHIEF JUSTICE HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE BHASKAR RAJ PRADHAN, JUDGE Mr. A. K.
